name: webhooknotazzrouter
description: Lambda para rotear entre webhook e Notazz baseado em chave Redis

scripts.deploy: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name b4you-production-webhookNotazzBalancer --zip-file fileb://webhookNotazzBalancer.zip --region sa-east-1
scripts.deploy:sandbox: npm run zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name b4you-sandbox-webhookNotazzBalancer --zip-file fileb://webhookNotazzBalancer.zip --region sa-east-1
